description:
Plagued by a tragic past, Boxer Sailor O'Connor (Dominic Purcell) is a man down, though he never lost a fight. When an accident gives him the opportunity to return to the ring, do not let it escape. Not knowing when to throw in the towel, Sailor has to face his personal demons or die trying to keep himself standing over a brutal and bloody fight in the ring. Also played by Louis Gossett Jr., Kim Coates and Famke Janssen, and with a special appearance by Freddie Roach.
